segments.text: From this angle, the kitchen looks like a scene frozen in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adults manage the dishes; the children plot their sweet heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water continues to overflow, and I feel surprised by how no one is reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can practically see the tension building as the boy leans further and further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What happens if he falls? That thought sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a delicate balance between the hilarity of kids and the seriousness of the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could call out a warning, but that would ruin their fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
